name: Arachne (liquidbutterflies)
description:
Arachne is a short, semi-animated visual novel about the story of Athena and Arachne. I made this game for a class, but it's definitely still in its beginning stages. The web version of this game has some trouble loading images quickly, so if you'd like the full experience you can download the game below. If you find any bugs or have any questions, please DM me on Instagram!

Thanks to Eric B. for helping me write the script!
